title: Foot in the air
creator_credit: Laura Brearley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In Farsi, the word for transition translates as foot in the air. With one foot in the air, Laura Brearley’s life changes dramatically. The injuries she sustained have lasted throughout her life, but they are indicative of both her vulnerability and resilience. On reflection, she realises her transition was not all bad, after all.
creator_credit_for_label: Laura Brearley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
